page.title: 14Himbleton Womens Institute
page.content: The W.I. meetings provide instruction , entertainment and social contacts. This branch started in 1931 and is headed by a President and Committee , elected annually. They organise monthly meetings of business , talk or demonstration , refreshments and social time. this year travel talks , self defence , stained glass and flower painting have been included. Topical matters like the drug problem , acid rain , education etc. are discussed , voted upon , and decisions taken by a delegate to the National A.G.M. in London. Money has been raised for a hospice and cancer research. An Over 60's Party , Dinner for All , Barbecue and Produce & Flower Show are all typical events. It is the best place for newcommers to meet other women.
